labels.analysis: The MCP Gumroad Server is designed to integrate with Gumroad, a platform for selling digital products. Its core functionality involves retrieving and managing product, sales, and offer code data via API commands. The server enables users to automate business operations like querying user information, managing product availability, and handling promotional offer codes. It aims to enhance productivity by allowing natural language interaction with Gumroad data through MCP-compatible clients.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "E-commerce" is chosen because the server's tools focus on managing online sales, products, and promotional codes, which are central to e-commerce operations. "API Integration" is a secondary label since the server interacts with Gumroad's APIs to retrieve and manipulate data. "Data Analysis & Processing" is another secondary label due to the ability to analyze sales and product data. No custom label is needed as the predefined categories adequately cover the server's functionality.

server_info_crawled.name: Gumroad Server
server_info_crawled.author: @rmarescu/gumroad-mcp
server_info_crawled.overview: Enable AI clients to interact seamlessly with your Gumroad account by accessing product, sales, offer code, and user data through a standardized protocol. Automate and analyze your Gumroad business operations with simple natural language commands. Quickly set up and integrate with MCP-compatible clients like Claude Desktop for enhanced productivity.

tools.name: gumroad_get_user
tools.description: Deploy Server Gumroad Server @rmarescu/gumroad-mcp Try in Playground gumroad_get_user

tools.name: gumroad_get_product
tools.description: Retrieves a single product by its ID

tools.name: gumroad_get_sales
tools.description: Retrieves all of the successful sales

tools.name: gumroad_disable_product
tools.description: Disables a product by its ID

tools.name: gumroad_enable_product
tools.description: Enables a product by its ID

tools.name: gumroad_get_offer_codes
tools.description: Retrieves all offer codes for a product

tools.name: gumroad_get_offer_code
tools.description: Retrieves a single offer code by its ID for a specific product

tools.name: gumroad_create_offer_code
tools.description: Creates a new offer code for a product

tools.name: gumroad_update_offer_code
tools.description: Updates the max purchase count of an existing offer code for a product

tools.name: gumroad_delete_offer_code
tools.description: Deletes an offer code for a product

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@rmarescu/gumroad-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())

smithery_configuration_requirements.name: gumroadAccessToken
smithery_configuration_requirements.description: Your Gumroad access token for authenticating API requests
